Name: Siam Twinstick
About the game: Pilots, wake up! You are awakened by a strange, godlike creature and your mission is to save the world from evil... Do you have the skills to master a badass, adrenaline pumping twinstick-shooter? - 22 levels - 6 boss-fights - 4 weapons - Many different enemys - Highscore system - Singleplayer or 2 player coop - 4 difficulty settings (beginner, advanced, expert, insane) - Full gamepad support - Mouse/keyboard controlls - 1080p Resolution - Many different music tracks
